summary: Project to build meeting management UI sections: meeting history with search, recent meetings with search, and member search.

existing_features.title: Provide a “Meeting History” section/page for authenticated users that lists all meetings and includes a search input to filter meetings case-insensitively by title and description, with clear loading, error, empty, and no-results states.

Provide a “Recent Meetings” section/page for authenticated users that shows the most recent meetings and includes a search input that filters within the recent subset by title and description case-insensitively, with clear loading, error, empty, and no-results states.

Provide a “Member Search” section/page for authenticated users that lists members and includes a search input to filter members case-insensitively by username, with clear loading, error, empty, and no-results states.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a meeting history section showing all meetings with a search option
Create a recent meetings section for recently held meetings (with search)
Ensure the signed-in navigation exposes entry points to Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search so users can reliably reach these sections.

projectName: Add Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search sections with search
